Description.Text:
Property Location
Citadines Antigone Montpellier is in the heart of Montpellier, walking distance from FNAC Montpellier and Esplanade de l'Europe. This residence is within close proximity of Polygone Shopping Center and Citadel of Montpellier.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 122 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Conveniences include coffee/tea makers, housekeeping is provided weekly, and irons/ironing boards can be requested.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a computer station, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge at scheduled times, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Citadines Antigone Montpellier is in the heart of Montpellier, walking distance from FNAC Montpellier and Esplanade de l'Europe. This residence is within close proximity of Polygone Shopping Center and Citadel of Montpellier.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

FNAC Montpellier - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Esplanade de l'Europe - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Polygone Shopping Center - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Citadel of Montpellier - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Le Triangle Shopping Center - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Pavillon Populaire - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Champ de Mars Garden - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Esplanade Charles de Gaulle - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Corum Convention Center - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Comedy Square - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Languedoc Museum - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Fabre Museum - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Opera House - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Pharmacie de la Misericorde - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Hotel des Tresoriers de France - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
Montpellier (XPJ-Montpellier SNCF Train Station) - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Montpellier (MPL-Montpellier - Mediterranean) - 6.5 km / 4 mi

The preferred airport for Citadines Antigone Montpellier is Montpellier (MPL-Montpellier - Mediterranean).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
